page.title: 03TOWLES KNITWEAR
page.content: Towles employs{1200 workers}who produce{3000 jumpers,1500 dozen {socks}and{1500 vests and pants}per week. They have{seven}factories-four of them in Loughborough.They sell them to many of the major stores.They mostly use pre-dyed yarn on cones using man-made material and natural wools. They have three main machines: the {V-bed machines}knit cuffs and edges which are elasticated.The{circular {machines}knit a tube for underwear, t-shirts etc.The{Flat Fashion Frame {machine}knits plain fabric for fronts,backs and sleeves.They are all controlled by punch card computer units. There are three different tests they have to do - a weight test, a length check and a quality check.
